item.description:
Indoor Roller Skate / Roller Blading

I miss rollerblading outdoors in LA so this is the next best thing.  I am cross posting with a few other groups.   Open skate from 1230-4pm.  I will be getting there at 1pm and will be wearing black shirt and jeans (check out my photo to see what I look like).  If there is interest we can grab a snack or drink afterwards.

 

The $7.00 Price includes rentals.  Rink safe roller blades welcome.

For more info: http://www.rollerpalace.net/specials.html
item.how_to_find_us: Will be wearing black shirt and jeans (check out my photo to see what I look like).
item.name: Last minute Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading Beverley
